verses.verse: At this <S%H2063><s%> also my heart <S%H3820><s%> trembles <S%H2729><s%>, and is moved out <S%H5425><s%> of his place <S%H4725><s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> attentively <S%H8085><s%> the noise <S%H7267><s%> of his voice <S%H6963><s%>, and the sound <S%H1899><s%> that goes out <S%H3318><s%> of his mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
He directs <S%H3474><s%> it <S%H8281><s%> under the whole heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and his lightning <S%H216><s%> unto the ends <S%H3671><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

After <S%H310><s%> it a voice <S%H6963><s%> roars <S%H7580><s%>: he thunders <S%H7481><s%> with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his excellency <S%H1347><s%>; and he will not stay <S%H6117><s%> them when his voice <S%H6963><s%> is heard <S%H8085><s%>.
God <S%H410><s%> thunders <S%H7481><s%> marvelously <S%H6381><s%> with his voice <S%H6963><s%>; great things <S%H1419><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> he <S%H3045><s%>, which we cannot comprehend.

For he says <S%H559><s%> to the snow <S%H7950><s%>, Be you <S%H1933><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%>; likewise to the small <S%H4306><s%> rain <S%H1653><s%>, and to the great <S%H4306><s%> rain <S%H1653><s%> of his strength <S%H5797><s%>.
He seals up <S%H2856><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of every man <S%H120><s%>; that all men <S%H582><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> his work <S%H4639><s%>.
Then the animals <S%H2416><s%> go <S%H935><s%> into <S%H1119><s%> dens <S%H695><s%>, and remain <S%H7931><s%> in their places <S%H4585><s%>.
Out of the south <S%H2315><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> the whirlwind <S%H5492><s%>: and cold <S%H7135><s%> out of the north <S%H4215><s%>.
By the breath <S%H5397><s%> of God <S%H410><s%> frost <S%H7140><s%> is given <S%H5414><s%>: and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> is frozen <S%H4164><s%>.
Also by watering <S%H7377><s%> he wearies <S%H2959><s%> the thick cloud <S%H5645><s%>: he scatters <S%H6327><s%> his bright <S%H216><s%> cloud <S%H6051><s%>:

And it is turned <S%H2015><s%> round about <S%H4524><s%> by his counsels <S%H8458><s%>: that they may do <S%H6467><s%> whatever he commanded <S%H6680><s%> them upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>.
He causes it to come <S%H4672><s%>, whether for correction <S%H7626><s%>, or for his land <S%H776><s%>, or for mercy <S%H2617><s%>.
Listen <S%H238><s%> unto this <S%H347><s%>, O Job: stand still <S%H5975><s%>, and consider <S%H995><s%> the wondrous <S%H6381><s%> works of God <S%H410><s%>.
Do you know <S%H3045><s%> when God <S%H433><s%> disposed <S%H7760><s%> them <S%H216><s%>, and caused the light of his cloud <S%H6051><s%> to shine <S%H3313><s%>?
Do you know <S%H3045><s%> the balancings <S%H4657><s%> of the clouds <S%H5645><s%>, the wondrous works <S%H4652><s%> of him which is perfect <S%H8549><s%> in knowledge <S%H1843><s%>?
How your garments <S%H899><s%> are warm <S%H2525><s%>, when he quiets <S%H8252><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> by the south wind <S%H1864><s%>?
Have you with him spread out <S%H7554><s%> the sky <S%H7834><s%>, which is strong <S%H2389><s%>, and as a molten <S%H3332><s%> looking mirror <S%H7209><s%>?
Teach <S%H3045><s%> us what we shall say <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H6186><s%>; for we cannot order our speech by reason <S%H6440><s%> of darkness <S%H2822><s%>.
Shall it be told <S%H5608><s%> him that I speak <S%H1696><s%>? if a man <S%H376><s%> speak <S%H559><s%>, surely he shall be swallowed up <S%H1104><s%>.
And now men see <S%H7200><s%> not the bright <S%H925><s%> light <S%H216><s%> which is in the clouds <S%H7834><s%>: but the wind <S%H7307><s%> passes <S%H5674><s%>, and cleanses them <S%H2891><s%>.
Fair weather <S%H2091><s%> comes <S%H857><s%> out of the north <S%H6828><s%>: with God <S%H433><s%> is terrible <S%H3372><s%> majesty <S%H1935><s%>.

Touching the Almighty <S%H7706><s%>, we cannot find him out <S%H4672><s%>: he is excellent <S%H7689><s%> in power <S%H3581><s%>, and in judgment <S%H4941><s%>, and in plenty <S%H7230><s%> of justice <S%H6666><s%>: he will not afflict <S%H6031><s%>.
Men <S%H582><s%> do therefore fear <S%H3372><s%> him <S%H7200><s%>: he respects not any that are wise <S%H2450><s%> of heart <S%H3820><s%>.
